content: Bill: After the 2016 Summer Spending Spree, you knew this category would be loaded — but did you ever think the inexplicable Mozgov-Deng contracts and Joakim Noah’s $73 million fiasco could take such a decided backseat to a much, much, much, much dumber contract? Grit ’n’ Grind … and $94 million of Chandler Parsons? An 82-game schedule … and Chandler Parsons’s ravaged knees? The city of Memphis … and Chandler Parsons’s Instagram account? When Mark Cuban says, “That contract is too risky,” that’s the basketball equivalent of Kris Jenner saying, “We probably shouldn’t do that; it’s in bad taste.” In other words, there’s no bigger red flag. And Memphis plowed ahead anyway. The least they could do is make Parsons their overpaid color analyst or something.
